info.description: Ambari REST APIs has inherent support for querying, sorting and pagination
info.title: Swagger spec for Ambari REST API

tags.name: Actions
tags.description: Endpoint for action definition specific operations

tags.name: Host Components
tags.description: Endpoint for host component specific operations

tags.name: RequestSchedules
tags.description: Endpoint for request schedule specific operations

tags.name: Root Service Configurations
tags.description: Endpoint for Ambari root service component configuration related operations

tags.name: Services
tags.description: Endpoint for querying root-level services, ie. Ambari Server and Ambari Agents

tags.name: User Authentication Sources
tags.description: Endpoint for user specific authentication source operations

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Filter fields in the response (identifier fields are mandatory)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort resources in result by (asc | desc)

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of resources to be returned for the paged response.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The starting page resource (inclusive).  "start" is also accepted.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ending page resource (inclusive).  "end" is also accepted.
